Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 3 Āsavagocchaka » 3.1 Āsavaduka » 3.1.7 Pañhāvāra » 3.1.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
Āsavagocchaka
Āsavaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
45.
1084Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye satta (sabbattha satta), namagge satta, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte satta, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta.
1085Anulomapaccanīyaṃ.
